title: Mix
synopsis: Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.
characters: ['Tachibana, Otomi', 'Tachibana, Souichirou', 'Tachibana, Touma', 'Ooyama, Haruka', 'Nishimura, Isami', 'Akai, Tomohito', 'Tachibana, Eisuke', 'Akai, Ryou', 'Narration', 'Natsuno, Ichiban']
